name: Silly Seashot
description:
In Silly Seashot you control a jumping ball that has a powerful dash. Use the dash to move around the map and also defeat the sea creatures!

Controls:

Keyboard: 'A' and 'D' to move, spacebar to dash.

Gamepad: Left stick to move, south button to dash.

Music credits:

SpaghettiLord1010

Fred Patry - Music Composer

audze

Share your highscore in the comments!
